name: Snowdown (Early Build)
description:
(NOTE: STILL IN DEVELOPMENT, TESTING AND FEEDBACK DESIRED)

Summary:

Ride to the bottom of one tall mountain with inflatable tubes that stick and ride together as one on contact (50 total!), weaving through multiple overlapping routes grabbing balloons for points and enter checkpoints to stay in control, or else be powerless before the unstoppable forces of gravity! For one to four players, boasts a casual pick-up-and-play focus with a low barrier to entry!

                                                       

Inspired by rollercoaster action chase films, classic arcade titles of the 1990s and modern Battle Royale games, Snowdown is also planned to have a more relaxed approach to traditional concepts of game flow and is thereby intended to compliment a more idle brand of party atmosphere, allowing players the freedom to step back and let a session play out by itself and come back to it later on if they so choose.

Plans beyond this early test build include environmental obstacles, player-activated hazards, custom tube selection on the ready-up screen and broader polish in terms of art style and level design. Feel free to leave any suggestions or feedback with a comment below or on the Twitter handle @BonsaiTreehouse where you can catch up on all Snowdown development every Saturday!

Keyboard Controls:
  • P = PAUSE
  • A = STEER LEFT
  • Q = LOOK LEFT
  • D = STEER RIGHT
  • E = LOOK RIGHT
  • W = LOOK UP
  • S = LOOK BEHIND
Gamepad Controls:
  • Left Option = PAUSE
  • Left Stick = STEER
  • D-Pad = LOOK AROUND
